subNodes.conversationText: root

|Ian and Miki|||***ga_fade_to_black-->Float::0    Float::0    Int::0    ***ga_jump_players-->String::wp_PC_bat_start    Int::1    Int::0    ***ga_remove_effects-->String::    ***ga_remove_effects-->String::b_Galdor    ***ga_remove_effects-->String::b_Veloria    ***gc_global_int-->NOT::False    String::miki_joined    String::1    ***gc_global_int-->NOT::False    String::ian_joined    String::1    ||
|long shot looking down road to battle field||***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::4    |
|overhead shot of Charnians in start positions|
Jadissan, the witch, has been defeated.
Yes, and so many have fallen in defense of Charnia.
|Galdor or Veloria||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Galdor    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Veloria    |
|Galdor and Veloria||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Galdor    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Veloria    |
Mother...father...oh, how wonderful that both of you survived the battle.
We couldn't have done it with out the help of you and your companions.
Yes, Ian has taken care of me this entire journey.
Quickly, we must attend to the wounded.
Yes mother, there is still much to do.
|IM-Boone or Ulrind||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Boone    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Ulrind    |
|Galdor||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Galdor    |
Father, oh how wonderful...you survived...but were is mother?
I am so sorry child...she has fallen defending us and Charnia.
No...please no.
I'm sorry Miki...there will be time for mourning, but for now, we must attend to the wounded.
Yes father...
|IM-Boone or Ulrind||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Boone    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Ulrind    |
|veloria||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Veloria    |
Mother, oh how wonderful...you survived...but were is father?
I am so sorry child...he has fallen defending us and Charnia.
No...please no.
I'm sorry Miki...there will be time for mourning, but for now, we must attend to the wounded.
Yes mother...
|IM-Boone or Ulrind||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Boone    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Ulrind    |
|IM-Boone or Ulrind||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Boone    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Ulrind    |
|Boone and Ulrind||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Boone    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Ulrind    |
Boone...Ulrind...I knew you two would be standing after the dust settled.
We couldn't have done it with out your help there buddy.
It's good to see that you, your <brother/sister>, and your other companions survived as well.
There is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
Let's go...
|IM-Sildor or Sandur||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sildor    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sandur    |
|Boone||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Boone    |
Boone...I knew you would be standing after the dust settled...but where are the others?
They didn't make it my friend...there are many that fell to the witch and her fiends.
Although this will be remembered as a glorious day, for today, it is a horrible day.
There is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
Let's go...
|IM-Sildor or Sandur||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sildor    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sandur    |
|Ulrind||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Ulrind    |
Ulrind...I knew you would be standing after the dust settled...but where are the others?
They didn't make it my friend...there are many that fell to the witch and her fiends.
Although this will be remembered as a glorious day, for today, it is a horrible day.
There is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
Let's go...
|IM-Sildor or Sandur||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sildor    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sandur    |
|IM-Sildor or Sandur||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sildor    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sandur    |
|Sildor and Sandur||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sildor    ***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sandur    |
Sildor...Sandur...the elf brothers have escaped death once again.
Yes <FirstName>, but many have not survived the battle.
Yes, I know, so few are still standing...
There is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
Let's go...
|IM-Adwen|
|Sildor||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sildor    |
Sildor...you have escaped death once again, but where is your brother, Sandur.
He...he...he didn't make it.  I tried to revive him but...but I couldn't.
I am so sorry Sildor...
I know, thank you...there is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
Yes Sildor...
|IM-Adwen|
|Sandur||***gc_local_int-->NOT::True    String::dead    String::1    String::b_Sandur    |
Sandur...you have escaped death once again, but where is your brother, Sildor.
He...he...he didn't make it.  I tried to revive him but...but I couldn't.
I am so sorry Sandur...
I know...there is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
Yes Sandur...
|IM-Adwen|
|IM-Adwen|
Father, there are so many who have fallen.
Yes <FirstName>, and they shall not be forgotten.
I am so happy that you survived, father.
I am so relieved that you and Ian made it, but there is still much work to do...we must attend to the wounded.
I agree father...
Let's go...
<StartHighlight>THE END</Start>
<StartHighlight>This is the end of this adventure...please take some time to leave comments and feedback on The Vault</Start>
<StartHighlight>After this conversation ends, you may export your character if you wish or just exit the game...</Start>
<StartHighlight>Thanks again for playing...</Start>
